text: Paige Rense (May 4, 1929 - January 1, 2021), also known as Paige Rense Noland, was an American editor. She was the editor in chief of Architectural Digest magazine, from 1975 until 2010. She is the founder of the Arthur Rense Prize poetry award. Rense also worked for Bon Appétit and was editor in chief of GEO.Joanne Powell, "Paige Rense, Editor in Chief of Architectural Digest, Bon Appétit, and GEO", Washington Journalism Review, May 1983, pp 36-41 She was born in Des Moines, Iowa. Rense died on January 1, 2021 at her home in West Palm Beach, Florida from heart disease, aged 91.Paige Rense, Trendsetting Editor of Architectural Digest, Dies at 91 ==References== Category:1929 births Category:2021 deaths Category:American novelists Category:American editors Category:Writers from Des Moines, Iowa Category:Businesspeople from Des Moines, Iowa
title: Paige Rense
